author: stoddard
msg: Fix build break. ap_file_t does not use the 'ungetchar' field. I added it for
consistency sake (and I think we can use it in the same way the Unix side does).
Did a bit of extra cleanup in the process: Eliminated the file->stated field, it

author: trawick
msg: Fix the problem that the reader of the pipe always got a \0 prefixed in
the buffer because of not setting ap_file_t->ungetchar to -1.

author: rbb
msg: Fix a prototype mistake from earlier commit.

author: rbb
msg: Fix the ap_poll implementation on Unix.  This stops us from re-allocating
the pollfd each time ap_poll is called.

author: stoddard
msg: Fix ap_strerror. It should both fill the user supplied buffer with the
message string and return a pointer to that same buffer (for convenience).
